name: Slash Chord
description:
Slash Chord is a short game where you use the Space key to attack enemies that come from the side of the screen. However, you have to do it in tune with the music.

This is my first actual game, so I'd really appreciate any feedback!

CREDITS:
santumerino - Code, art, level design.
With music from freemusicarchive.com released under a Creative Commons BY-SA license.

This game was created for the Music Game Jam.

UPDATE:

There are two versions of the game. The first one (MusicGameJam version) is the version I uploaded for the game jam. This version is only available as an .exe file.

The second one (Post-MGJ version) is an updated version with a bunch of fixes and other tweaks here and there which was made way after the deadline. This version is in HTML5.
